vocabinfos.mediumDef:
a gem, precious stone, emerald (Josephus)
Also means: bar.qat (בָּֽרְקַת "gem" H1304B)
§ a gem, precious stone, emerald (Josephus)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: piedra preciosa verde; LXX esmeralda; KB NIV berilo; RSV JB carbunclo; NEB feldespato verde;
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition: 寶玉, 寶石, 翡翠
vocabinfos._zh_Definition: 宝玉, 宝石, 翡翠
